name: LLOYDQUEST
description:
A project I did in college where we had to make a small game in Flash. I made a visual novel based on the main characters of a comic I've been toying with for some time. Lloyd is a crude stockboy.

Hint: if you're stuck, try to click on things in the background!

Also: I could not get the coin counting minigame to work. You can move the coins around but she'll accept your payment even if you only give her a paperclip. Sadly the original file has been lost so what you see is what you get, but maybe someday in the future...?

Flash has since been kinda deprecated so apologies that this doesn't run in a better format! You'll need to temporarily enable Flash in your browser to play.
